summary: Landing page generator app with live preview feature. Recurring canister stopping issue with wxhw5-jyaaa-aaaam-ahg7a-cai; rebuilding as fresh project to get a new canister assigned.
architectural_notes: App is deployed on DFINITY/ICP infrastructure using canisters. Canister wxhw5-jyaaa-aaaam-ahg7a-cai repeatedly stops after deployment, likely due to insufficient cycles.
Rebuilding as a fresh project to obtain a new canister assignment and avoid the stopped canister issue.
known_issues: Canister wxhw5-jyaaa-aaaam-ahg7a-cai keeps stopping after deployment (Reject code 5), suspected cycles issue.

existing_features.title: Rebuild the complete Noventra.Ai landing page generator application from scratch as a fresh project, preserving all existing functionality: session management (create, list, delete sessions), chat interface with AI assistant, landing page HTML/CSS scaffold generation, and live preview of generated landing pages.

Preserve the existing dark theme design system: Space Grotesk / Inter / JetBrains Mono typography, OKLCH color tokens, glassmorphism card styles, glow effects, and the overall Noventra.Ai visual identity across all pages (Home, Sessions, New Session, Chat).
